oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Broadband planar rectangular monopole antennas

ANOB, PV

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: planar rectangular monopole antenna
broadband monopole antenna
microstrip antenna
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper describes a broadband planar rectangular monopole antenna. Both theoretical and experimental investigations have been carried out to draw an analogy between this monopole antenna and a rectangular microstrip antenna. Parametric studies have been carried out to optimize the bandwidth of the planar rectangular monopole antenna. There is good agreement between the theoretical and experimental results.
